#text=I wanted to go for a bike ride , so I went out to the garage to get my bike .
#text=I brought it out to the driveway and got on .
#text=I noticed that something did n't feel right .
#text=I looked down and noticed that my front tire was flat .
#text=I went back into the garage and brought out my bicycle pump .
#text=I removed the cover from the air valve and attached the pump to it .
#text=I pumped up and down on the handle a few times and noticed that the air was not staying in .
#text=I went back into the garage , again , and this time I brought out my bicycle repair kit .
#text=I found the hole in my tire , put a patch on , and then filled the tire with air .
#text=The patch seemed to be nice and sturdy and I believed it was going to hold .
#text=I put the air pump and the bicycle tire patch kit back into the garage , put on my helmet , and rode my bicycle down the street .
